word: Influence / Effect / Impact + ON

meanings.tr: Bu kelimeler "on" prepositionuyla kullanılır
meanings.en: These words are used with the preposition "on"

exampleSentence: The new policy had a significant effect ON the economy. / Social media has a huge influence ON teenagers. / Climate change will have a major impact ON future generations.

word: Turn / Change / Transform / Convert + INTO

meanings.tr: Bu kelimeler "into" prepositionuyla kullanılır (dönüşüm anlamı)
meanings.en: These words are used with "into" for transformation meaning

exampleSentence: Water can turn INTO ice at low temperatures. / The company transformed INTO a global brand. / They converted the old factory INTO a modern museum.

word: Overcome / Tackle / Handle / Cope with / Deal with

meanings.tr: Hepsi "üstesinden gelmek" anlamına gelir (eş anlamlı)
meanings.en: All mean "to manage/handle a difficult situation" (synonyms)

exampleSentence: She overcame her fear of public speaking. / We need to tackle this problem immediately. / He learned to cope with stress through meditation.

word: Lead to / Cause / Result in / Bring about / Give rise to

meanings.tr: Hepsi "sebep olmak, yol açmak" anlamına gelir (eş anlamlı)
meanings.en: All mean "to cause something to happen" (synonyms)

exampleSentence: Smoking can lead to serious health problems. / The accident resulted in several injuries. / His speech gave rise to a heated debate.

word: Depend on / Rely on / Count on / Bank on / Rest on

meanings.tr: Hepsi "birine/bir şeye güvenmek veya bağlı olmak" anlamına gelir
meanings.en: All mean "to trust or be contingent upon" (synonyms)

exampleSentence: Success depends on hard work and dedication. / You can always rely on your true friends. / I'm counting on you to finish this project.

word: Prevent / Stop / Hinder / Prohibit / Ban / Restrict + FROM

meanings.tr: Bu kelimeler "from" ile kullanılır (engelleme/yasaklama anlamı)
meanings.en: These words use "from" to express prevention or prohibition

exampleSentence: The law prevents companies FROM polluting rivers. / Security guards stopped him FROM entering the building. / Parents prohibited their children FROM using social media.

word: Increase / Rise / Growth / Surge + IN & Decrease / Fall / Decline + IN

meanings.tr: Artış veya azalışı ifade ederken "in" edatı kullanılır
meanings.en: Use "in" preposition when expressing increase or decrease

exampleSentence: There has been a significant increase IN unemployment. / We observed a sharp rise IN prices last month. / The decline IN sales worried the management.

word: Participate in / Take part in / Join / Engage in / Be involved in

meanings.tr: Hepsi "katılmak, dahil olmak" anlamına gelir (eş anlamlı)
meanings.en: All mean "to take part in an activity" (synonyms)

exampleSentence: Students are encouraged to participate in extracurricular activities. / She decided to take part in the competition. / Many volunteers are involved in the charity work.

word: Postpone / Put off / Delay / Suspend & Cancel / Call off

meanings.tr: Ertelemek, askıya almak & İptal etmek
meanings.en: To delay/suspend & To cancel

exampleSentence: The meeting was postponed until next week. / We had to put off our vacation due to work. / The concert was called off because of the storm.

word: Deter / Discourage / Dissuade + FROM

meanings.tr: Bu kelimeler "from" ile kullanılır (caydırma anlamı)
meanings.en: These words use "from" to express discouragement

exampleSentence: High prices deter customers FROM buying. / Parents tried to discourage him FROM dropping out. / Nothing could dissuade her FROM pursuing her dream.

word: Devote / Dedicate / Commit / Allocate + TO

meanings.tr: Bu kelimeler "to" ile kullanılır (adamak, tahsis etmek)
meanings.en: These words use "to" for dedication or allocation

exampleSentence: She devoted her life TO helping others. / The government allocated more funds TO education. / He committed himself TO finishing the project.

word: Stem from / Result from / Derive from / Originate from

meanings.tr: Hepsi "-den kaynaklanmak, -den türemek" anlamına gelir
meanings.en: All mean "to come from, to originate" (synonyms)

exampleSentence: His problems stem from poor financial decisions. / The word derives from ancient Greek. / This tradition originates from medieval times.

word: Provide / Supply / Furnish / Equip + WITH

meanings.tr: Bu kelimeler "with" ile kullanılır (sağlamak, donatmak)
meanings.en: These words use "with" for providing or equipping

exampleSentence: The company provides employees WITH health insurance. / The school supplied students WITH new textbooks. / The gym is equipped WITH modern facilities.

word: Consist of / Comprise / Be composed of / Be made up of / Contain

meanings.tr: Hepsi "-den oluşmak, içermek" anlamına gelir (eş anlamlı)
meanings.en: All mean "to be formed of, to include" (synonyms)

exampleSentence: The team consists of five members. / Water is composed of hydrogen and oxygen. / The book comprises ten chapters.

word: Emphasize / Stress / Underline / Highlight / Accentuate

meanings.tr: Hepsi "vurgulamak, önemini belirtmek" anlamına gelir
meanings.en: All mean "to give special importance to" (synonyms)

exampleSentence: The teacher emphasized the importance of practice. / I want to stress that safety comes first. / The report highlights the main findings.

word: Despite / In spite of / Although / Even though / Though

meanings.tr: Hepsi "-e rağmen / olmasına rağmen" anlamına gelir (Zıtlık bildiren bağlaçlar)
meanings.en: All mean "regardless of / even if" (Contrast conjunctions)

exampleSentence: Despite the rain, we went out. / Although he is rich, he is not happy. / In spite of his efforts, he failed.

word: Therefore / Thus / Hence / Consequently / As a result

meanings.tr: Hepsi "bu yüzden / sonuç olarak" anlamına gelir (Sonuç bildiren zarflar)
meanings.en: All mean "for that reason / as a consequence" (Result transitions)

exampleSentence: It was raining; therefore, we stayed home. / She didn't study; consequently, she failed. / Demand increased; thus, prices went up.

word: Moreover / Furthermore / In addition / Besides / What's more

meanings.tr: Hepsi "ayrıca / buna ek olarak / üstelik" anlamına gelir (Ekleme)
meanings.en: All mean "also / additionally" (Addition transitions)

exampleSentence: The car is too expensive; moreover, it uses too much gas. / He is a talented actor; furthermore, he sings well. / In addition to English, she speaks French.

word: Due to / Owing to / Because of / On account of / Thanks to

meanings.tr: Hepsi "-den dolayı / yüzünden / sayesinde" anlamına gelir (Sebep)
meanings.en: All mean "as a result of / caused by" (Reason prepositions)

exampleSentence: The match was cancelled due to rain. / She succeeded thanks to hard work. / We were late because of traffic.

word: Accuse (of) / Charge (with) / Blame (for) / Criticize (for)

meanings.tr: Suçlama ve eleştirme fiilleri farklı edatlarla kullanılır: of, with, for
meanings.en: Verbs of accusation use different prepositions: of, with, for

exampleSentence: They accused him OF theft. / He was charged WITH murder. / Don't blame me FOR your mistakes.

word: Succeed in / Manage to / Achieve / Accomplish

meanings.tr: Hepsi "başarmak" anlamına gelir ama gramerleri farklıdır (in doing / to do)
meanings.en: All mean "to succeed" but have different grammar (in doing / to do)

exampleSentence: She succeeded IN solving the problem. / He managed TO finish on time. / They achieved their goals.

word: Focus on / Concentrate on / Center on / Pay attention to

meanings.tr: Hepsi "odaklanmak / dikkat etmek" anlamına gelir ve "on/to" alır
meanings.en: All mean "to give attention to" and take "on/to"

exampleSentence: Please focus ON you work. / I can't concentrate ON reading. / Pay attention TO the warnings.

word: However / On the other hand / Conversely / Whereas / While

meanings.tr: Zıtlık bildiren bağlaçlar; cümle başı ve ortasında kullanılır
meanings.en: Contrast conjunctions; used at the beginning or middle of sentences

exampleSentence: The team played well; however, they lost. / Some people love hot weather, whereas others prefer the cold. / While I understand your point, I still disagree.

word: In order TO / So as TO & So THAT

meanings.tr: Amaç bildirir; to'dan sonra fiilin yalın hali, that'den sonra cümle gelir
meanings.en: Expresses purpose; 'to' is followed by V1, 'that' by a full sentence

exampleSentence: He studied hard IN ORDER TO pass the exam. / I left early SO THAT I could catch the train. / They moved SO AS TO be closer to work.

word: Provided that / As long as / Unless / In case

meanings.tr: Koşul ve önlem yapıları; Unless = if not (medikçe/madıkça)
meanings.en: Condition and precaution structures; Unless means 'if not'

exampleSentence: You can stay here AS LONG AS you are quiet. / UNLESS it rains, we will have a picnic. / Take an umbrella IN CASE it rains.

word: Relevant TO / Related TO / Associated WITH / Linked TO

meanings.tr: Hepsi "ilişkili / ilgili" anlamına gelir; kullanılan edatlara dikkat!
meanings.en: All mean 'related to'; pay attention to the prepositions used!

exampleSentence: The data is RELEVANT TO our research. / Heart disease is often ASSOCIATED WITH smoking. / These events are closely LINKED TO each other.

word: Abstain FROM / Refrain FROM / Avoid

meanings.tr: Hepsi "kaçınmak / uzak durmak" anlamına gelir; Abstain/Refrain "from" alır
meanings.en: All mean 'to keep away from'; Abstain/Refrain take the preposition 'from'

exampleSentence: You should ABSTAIN FROM drinking alcohol. / Please REFRAIN FROM smoking in this area. / He tries to AVOID eye contact.

word: Enhance / Ameliorate / Improve / Boost / Advance

meanings.tr: Hepsi "iyileştirmek / geliştirmek" anlamına gelir (Olumlu gelişim)
meanings.en: All mean 'to make something better' (Positive development)

exampleSentence: This exercise will ENHANCE your skills. / The medicine helped AMELIORATE the pain. / We need new ideas to BOOST sales.

word: Aggravate / Deteriorate / Undermine / Weaken / Worsen

meanings.tr: Hepsi "kötüleştirmek / zayıflatma" anlamına gelir (Olumsuz etki)
meanings.en: All mean 'to make something worse' (Negative impact)

exampleSentence: Stress can AGGRAVATE your health issues. / The weather is expected to DETERIORATE tomorrow. / These rumors UNDERMINE his authority.

word: Comply WITH / Conform TO / Abide BY / Adhere TO

meanings.tr: Hepsi "yasalara / kurallara uymak" demektir; edatlar hayat kurtarır!
meanings.en: All mean 'to follow rules/laws'; prepositions are life savers!

exampleSentence: All visitors must COMPLY WITH the rules. / Students must CONFORM TO the school policy. / You must ABIDE BY the court's decision.

word: Search FOR / Seek / Look FOR / Pursue

meanings.tr: Hepsi "aramak / peşinden koşmak" anlamına gelir; Seek edat almaz!
meanings.en: All mean 'to search/look for'; Seek does not take a preposition!

exampleSentence: Scientists are SEARCHING FOR a cure. / They decided to SEEK professional advice. / She is PURSUING a career in medicine.

word: Lack OF / Devoid OF / Deprived OF / Short OF

meanings.tr: Hepsi "-den yoksun / eksik olma" anlamına gelir; hepsi "of" alır
meanings.en: All mean 'to be without something'; they all take the preposition 'of'

exampleSentence: His speech showed a LACK OF confidence. / The region is DEVOID OF natural resources. / They were DEPRIVED OF their basic rights.
